sets.name: Protector of Fire
sets.tags: Ccbs, Fire, Narmoto, Okoto, Protectors, Skull Spider,
sets.description:
Put the heat on the Skull Spider with the Protector of Fire!

Emergency! The Protector of Fire is under attack from the Skull Spider emerging from the molten lava lake. This sturdy, highly posable figure is fully equipped for the heat of battle, so strike back with the flame swords and open fire with the rapid-shooting Elemental Fire Blaster. You must take down the thieving invader before it can pop off the Protector’s mask.

  • Features a BIONICLE® head with dual-tone mask and mask pop-off trigger, BIONICLE shell, fists of fire with 2 flame swords, Elemental Fire Blaster with rapid shooter and ammunition, and posable joints
  • Also includes a pale green Skull Spider
  • Adjust the arms and legs for ferocious battle poses
  • Turn up the heat with the flame swords
  • Attack with the rapid shooter
  • Don't let the Skull Spider pop off the mask!
  • Durable design for intense action play
  • Combine with 70787 LEGO® BIONICLE® Tahu– Master of Fire using building instructions available at LEGO.com/BIONICLE to power up for ultra elemental battle!
  • Stands over 5” (15cm) tall
